name: Gav-Gav Odyssey
overview: Gav-Gav Odyssey is another way to get a blast from the gaming past! This game merges the best elements from the golden age of gaming: platforming, scroll shooting and puzzles. Cute doggies as key heroes are combined with challenging puzzle tricks, capturing your interest for hours of gaming heaven. The setting looks so authentic that someone might think this game was released on 8 or 16-bit platforms 20 or 30 years ago! Nice pixel art graphics, friendly gameplay and funny cutscenes will charm kids and grown-ups alike, especially those who can still remember the best platforming games of the 80's and 90’s! Features: • Detailed and colorful pixel art approach • Nice canine plot that requires you to save your doggie friends • Two types of gameplay: scroll shooter and puzzle platforming • Rich amount of secrets, easter eggs and cultural references
